tagline: Commercetools is a cloud-based e-commerce platform that provides a flexible commerce API at its core. It supports modern microservices-based architectures and offers a wide range of integrations. Commercetools is the answer to the most common problems in e-commerce today. First, an API-first approach creates microservices, services, and integrations with third-party solutions, making solutions scalable, easier to maintain, and less costly. Second, you can use commercetools to add e-commerce capabilities to your microservices-based landscape. Finally, commercetools creates innovative commerce experiences that drive traffic to your digital touchpoints and deliver great shopping experiences that can increase customer satisfaction and loyalty.
